data.text:
@jakovanrensburg @stefanbar 
Done with the feature + the additional scope creep.
Initial task was for the vault size to be increased by client.

Problem was there is no Client Management console or functionality to do the above mentioned.

Added that.
You can now do the following:

* View list of all clients on VaultWorks
* View their Security Questions (not answers)
* View their basic information
* Update Vault size
* View all associated companies and client's role in each.

Stefan - please just get icons for menu items please and let Gillian and testers know about new feature next time you do a release to UAT please.
